description: Convert JSON data to binary data

essential_properties.name: sourceProperty
essential_properties.description: The name of the input field that contains the base64 string to convert to a file. Use dot-notation for deep fields (e.g. 'level1.level2.currentKey').

essential_properties.name: sourceProperty
essential_properties.description: The name of the input field that contains a string to convert to a file. Use dot-notation for deep fields (e.g. 'level1.level2.currentKey').

essential_properties.name: start
essential_properties.description: Date and time at which the event begins. (For all-day events, the time will be ignored.).

essential_properties.name: end
essential_properties.description: Date and time at which the event ends. (For all-day events, the time will be ignored.).

essential_properties.name: binaryPropertyName
essential_properties.description: The field that your iCalendar file will be available under in the output

common_operations.name: Convert to CSV
common_operations.description: Transform input data into a CSV file

common_operations.name: Convert to HTML
common_operations.description: Transform input data into a table in an HTML file

common_operations.name: Convert to ICS
common_operations.description: Converts each input item to an ICS event file

common_operations.name: Convert to JSON
common_operations.description: Transform input data into a single or multiple JSON files

common_operations.name: Convert to ODS
common_operations.description: Transform input data into an ODS file
